com.davidbracewell.io

Interface DataAccessObject<PRIMARY_KEY,OBJECT_TYPE>


  • public interface DataAccessObject<PRIMARY_KEY,OBJECT_TYPE>
    Interface providing basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, and Delete) operations for objects backed by various data stores, e.g. SQL
    Author:
    David B. Bracewell

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OBJECT_TYPE get(PRIMARY_KEY primaryKey)
      Gets an object by primary key
      List<OBJECT_TYPE> getAll(Iterable<? extends PRIMARY_KEY> primaryKeys)
      Gets all objects associated with the primary keys.
      PRIMARY_KEY put(OBJECT_TYPE object)
      Puts an object into the data store
      List<PRIMARY_KEY> putAll(Iterable<? extends OBJECT_TYPE> objects)
      Puts all objects in the data store
      OBJECT_TYPE remove(PRIMARY_KEY primaryKey)
      Removes an object
      void update(PRIMARY_KEY primaryKey, OBJECT_TYPE object)
      Updates an object.

        PRIMARY_KEY put(OBJECT_TYPE object)
         throws IOException
        Puts an object into the data store
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        OBJECT_TYPE get(PRIMARY_KEY primaryKey)
         throws IOException
        Gets an object by primary key
        Parameters:
        primaryKey - the primary key
        Returns:
        the object or null if none matches the primary key
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getAll

        List<OBJECT_TYPE> getAll(Iterable<? extends PRIMARY_KEY> primaryKeys)
                  throws IOException
        Gets all objects associated with the primary keys.
        Parameters:
        primaryKeys - the primary keys
        Returns:
        All objects for the given primary keys
        Throws:
        IOException
